aws:requesttag/${tagkey}.description: Filters access by the tag key-value pairs present in the request

aws:resourcetag/${tagkey}.description: Filters access by the tag key-value pairs attached to the resource

aws:tagkeys.description: Filters access by the tag keys present in the request

emr-containers:executionrolearn.description: Filters access by the execution role arn present in the request

emr-containers:jobtemplatearn.description: Filters access by the job template arn present in the request
